forumNotes.author: cangrejero
forumNotes.content: How do I replace the image inside of back.xpm.gz? The girl looks nice but my wife doesn't like her. Like we are going on a date!

forumNotes.author: steve6375
forumNotes.content:
See the grub4dos tutorial [here](http://www.rmprepusb.com/tutorials/grub4dos#TOC-Make-a-high-resolution-splashimage-file "External link").

Load the menu.lst file (press F4 in RMPRepUSB), find the line that loads the image and replace it with, for example

```
#for an 800 x 600 24 bit colour background
graphicsmode   -1   800 100:1000   24
splashimage /nice800.bmp.gz || splashimage /nice800.bmp
```

where nice800.bmp is your 800x600 bitmap (or you can compress it using 7Zip to a gz file.)  
Place the nice800.bmp file on your USB drive.  
Test by pressing F11 in RMPrepUSB.
